_sText:
Welcome to mg_Tower Defense Source !!!

Gameplay:

Your Team must Defense the Castle for Incoming Units. The Units Walk a path to the Castle. Your Team must stop them.When 100 Units incoming in the Castle your Team Lost The Game. After 30 Levels Your Team comes to the Endboss fight. Play in Team or you will Die !!!

DESCRIPTION

Required plugin for XIX Tower Defense. The plugin controls the health of the units and gives the players money per unit kill. The plugin is only active if the map is loaded. The plugin will not affect the performance of the server.

Whats new:

-800$ startmoney

-Random Weapon treasure chest steel block 

-Script change difficult for max 30 Players (a lot easier for over 30 Players)

-Little bit other tower design


About Map:

-30 Lvls (Ground,Air,Tanks,Fast Units)

-4 Boss Units and 1 Endboss fight

-About 2500 Units to kill

-Warcraft Sounds and music

-A random Weapon treasure chest (cost 1000$)

-10 Defense Tower

-inspired by Warcraft 3 Tower Defense

REQUIREMENTS FOR PLAY THE MAP !!!

-Sourcemod 1.4
-Requirement for Sourcemod: Metamod:Source 1.8+
 Download Link ---) (www.sourcemod.net)

Have Fun !!!
